entry.title: [GRA7][WebPaaS] - Routine Maintenance
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Oct 23, 21:00 - 22:00 UTC

Sep 25, 07:15 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 23/10/2023 21:00 UTC
End time : 23/10/2023 22:00 UTC
Service impact : Console User Interface will be unavailable during about 1 minute on ovhcloud-fr-1.webpaas.ovh.net.
Service improvement : Our partner will be doing a routine maintenance on OVHCLOUD-FR-1 region to release an underlying software upgrade. All projects and environments will continue to function during the upgrade.

entry.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Internet eligibility perturbation
entry.content:
Sep 27, 11:41 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 26/09/2023 16:30 UTC
End time : 27/09/2023 10:20 UTC
Root cause : Our provider fixed this issue
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 27, 08:03 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 26/09/2023 16:30 UTC
Service impact : The Internet Access eligibility by number is currently unavailable. Our provider is working on the issue.
Workaround : The eligibility by address and building is still working for fiber eligibility.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.

entry.title: [FR][xDSL/FTTH] - Internet perturbation
entry.content:
Sep 21, 21:08 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 21/09/2023 20:27 UTC
End time : 21/09/2023 20:58 UTC
Root cause : Related to the maintenance https://bare-metal-servers.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/y98h387ctq53
Our technical teams resolved the issue. All impacted services are now operational.

Sep 21, 21:03 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 21/09/2023 20:27 UTC
Service impact : We have an ongoing issue on 2 of our DNS servers (91.121.161.184 & 91.121.164.227), you may experience navigation difficulties.
Ongoing actions : Investigating
Our technical teams are working on the issue. Update will be post as significant progress is made.
Workaround : If you have a personal modem or a modem not manage by OVHcloud, We encourage you to use theses DNS servers : 91.121.61.147 / 87.98.149.171.
